title: V2 API support for the SystemInfoHandler
description:
SystemInfoHandler does not have a V2 API.

 

We should have a V2 equivalent for http://localhost:8983/solr/admin/info/system

comments.content: I believe this already exists at http://localhost:8983/api/node/system. The table in the Google Doc attached to SOLR-8029 shows this equivalency mapping also.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett

comments.content: Thanks Cassandra! I must have missed it
comments.author: Varun Thacker
